gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Recommended tool for visualizing CFDDA reanalysis dataset.
Shell-command style, stand-alone programs that take netCDF, HDF, and/or DAP files as input and output the results in text, binary, or netCDF formats.

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This is a test record for validating how all the NCAR Dialect elements (Tier 1, 2, & 3) will be displayed in CKAN.

gmd:credit.gco:CharacterString: We would like to acknowledge the use of computational resources (doi:10.5065/D6RX99HX) at the NCAR-Wyoming Supercomputing Center provided by the National Science Foundation and the State of Wyoming, and supported by NCAR's Computational and Information Systems Laboratory.

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: ICARTT - International Consortium for Atmospheric Research on Transport and Transformation

gmd:keyword.gco:CharacterString: EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > ATMOSPHERIC WATER VAPOR > WATER VAPOR INDICATORS > LAYERED PRECIPITABLE WATER
EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > ATMOSPHERIC CHEMISTRY > OXYGEN COMPOUNDS > OZONE

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: This is the text for other constraints, which will show up under the "Access Constraints" field in the Search & Discovery interface.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Temporal Resolution #1: hourly Temporal Resolution #2: monthly

gml:VerticalCRS.gml:scope: This is the scope for this vertical information.
